MPC HC is a versatile media player for Windows that supports a range of audio and video formats. It is a free, open-source project that is constantly being updated and improved by a team of dedicated developers. MPC HC is designed to be easy to use, offer a wide range of features, and be highly customizable.

In this article, we will explore the features of MPC HC and provide a comprehensive guide on how to use this media player.

## Features of MPC HC

MPC HC offers a variety of features, including:

### Support for a wide range of audio and video formats

MPC HC supports a wide range of audio and video formats, including MP4, AVI, MKV, FLV, AAC, AC3, MP3, and more. This means that you can play almost any type of media file with MPC HC, without the need for additional plugins or codecs.

### Customizable user interface

MPC HC offers a highly customizable user interface, which allows you to change the skin, layout, and color scheme of the player. You can also assign keyboard shortcuts to commonly used functions, and customize the context menu to suit your needs.

### Advanced playback options

MPC HC offers a range of advanced playback options, such as: playback speed control, subtitle support, video rendering options, and audio channel mapping.

### Built-in codecs

MPC HC comes with a range of built-in codecs, which means that you don't need to install additional codecs to play your media files. This also ensures that you don't accidentally download and install malicious or outdated codecs.

## How to use MPC HC

### Step 1: Download and install MPC HC

You can download MPC HC from the official website. Once you have downloaded the installer, double-click it and follow the installation wizard to install MPC HC on your computer.

### Step 2: Open a media file

To open a media file, click on "File" in the menu bar and select "Open File". Alternatively, you can drag and drop a media file onto the player.

### Step 3: Customize the player

To customize the player, click on "View" in the menu bar and select "Options". Here, you can change the skin, layout, color scheme, keyboard shortcuts, and more.

### Step 4: Play your media file

To play your media file, click on the "Play" button in the player. You can also use the shortcut "Ctrl + P".

## Conclusion

MPC HC is a versatile media player that offers a range of features and customization options. With support for a wide range of audio and video formats, advanced playback options, and built-in codecs, MPC HC is an excellent choice for anyone looking for a reliable media player for Windows.
